conversations.body_text: Hi chris knoch,  Apologies for the previous incorrect tracking number. Here is the corrected tracking number: FedEx • 396212341182.

that is for the heptics. we're is the handbrake tracking number. please see prior email order. 

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

Handbrake??? were is the hand brake  in this order.  the heptics have been delivered. were is the hand brake?

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

thanks 

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

The van pro haptic shut down and start buzzing after 10-20 min of play time. How do I get a replacement/refund ?


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Dear Simsonn Customer Service,
I am writing to follow up on the persistent issues I am experiencing with recent product purchases and to seek a comprehensive resolution.
Regarding the Van Pro Haptic, which I previously reported as shutting down and buzzing after 10-20 minutes of use, I have also documented this problem within a public review, including a video illustrating the malfunction. Furthermore, I am consistently encountering significant interference issues stemming from the pedals.
As a loyal customer who appreciates your brand, I have invested in several of your products. It is, therefore, very disappointing that three different items I have purchased have been non-functional directly out of the box. While I genuinely enjoy your products when they perform as intended, this repeated lack of functionality has been a source of considerable frustration.
I would like to request either a full exchange for fully functional products, or a complete refund for the affected items. Please provide clear instructions on the necessary steps to initiate this process.
For transparency, I am documenting my experiences with these products for my YouTube channel and will be sharing this journey with my followers and the wider public. My aim is not to seek any special treatment, but simply to receive the reliable, working products that I paid for. I am eager to support your brand, especially given the high quality I experience when your products are operational.
I understand that the holiday season can be particularly busy, and I appreciate your time and attention to this matter. I am not in an immediate rush for a resolution.
Thank you for your assistance.
Sincerely,
Chris Knoch Pitstop Media

Hi chris knoch,     You can follow the solution below and test again after grounding. If the issue persists, please provide your contact information, phone number, and address, and we will send you a replacement control box.        If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
